Hi

he must be a real samurai 

after all he wears chinese made samurai armour (Paul
chen) and a spanish made crappy katana.

if thats the case them I am one as well. I have all
that crap in my dojo.

if you see what his job is and who he is married to
you can see this is the only reason he made it onto tv
and the papers.

TV producer/cameraman. with a TV presenter wife. Not
hard to get some info thrown onto someones desk
somewhere to get your face on tv then is it.

His wife is a terrible presenter as well, when she did
Blue peter a kids show all i wanted to do was set the
shows resident tortoise on her and have them savage
her.

Paul
